# CMVideoCodecType | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Core Media ](/documentation/coremedia)

- [ CMVideoCodecType ](/documentation/CoreMedia/CMVideoCodecType)

-  CMVideoCodecType 

Type Alias# CMVideoCodecType

A video codec type.iOS 4.0+iPadOS 4.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.7+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+

```
typealias CMVideoCodecType = FourCharCode
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreMedia/CMVideoCodecType#Discussion)

Certain codec types are also pixel formats.

There is no “kCMVideoCodecType_Raw”; you should use the appropriate pixel format type as the codec type.

## [Topics](/documentation/CoreMedia/CMVideoCodecType#topics)
